ygData.subject: Re: Skill Changes
ygData.msgSnippet: Gee, so they will STILL be playing in the evenings?  Bummer... I was kinda hoping maybe they would be doing homework and going to bed so they could get up
ygData.messageBody:
Gee, so they will STILL be playing in the evenings? Bummer... I was kinda
hoping maybe they would be doing homework and going to bed so they could get
up early for school...

After all, what do I care who is playing during the daytime?? I can't... I
WORK days... hehe...

Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server
Proud member of Platinum Sphere Guild - www.platinumsphere.com



----- Original Message -----
From: Whitcraft,David <DWHITCRAFT@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 8:02 AM
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Skill Changes


> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> Ya know, I never thought about this. This is a very good point. When Sept
> rolls around, they'll probably be doing what the rest of us are doing,
> playing in the evening primarily....
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: omnibus@... [mailto:omnibus@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 5:44 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Skill Changes
>
>
> From: <omnibus@...>
>
> what people dont seem to understand is that it is summer vacation. all
> the little kiddies are at home all day long now, and have alot of time to
> waste away on eq. i suspect when september rolls around and kids dont
> have 16 hours/day to play eq, things will get better, at least until the
> next school vacation...
>
> Omnibus LightStorm
> Lvl. 22 Paladin, E'ci
>
>
>
